sentences.en: BRS 1000 carbon rubber and injected Waffle Grip outsole combine for a light durable traction pattern.
sentences.cn: 进军1000个碳橡胶和注入登上着船外抓地力相结合,为轻,持久耐用的牵引模式.

sentences.en: Cut the waffle and get to the point.

sentences.cn: 你感谢那个华夫饼乾 呢 ?

sentences.en: Do you want your scoop in a waffle cup?
sentences.cn: 您想用脆皮饼干杯装冰淇淋 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dunst may not like the score, but she definitely likes waffle fries.
sentences.cn: 邓斯特或许不喜欢这个分数, 但她绝对喜欢华夫饼.

sentences.en: He needs to be a lot clearer and firmer about how he will deal with America’s foes and rivals: his first instinct when Russia invaded Georgia was to waffle.
sentences.cn: 他需要更加清楚以及坚定他将如何处理美国的敌人和竞争对手。 当俄罗斯入侵格鲁吉亚的时候，他的第一反应竟认为这是胡扯。
他写的满篇都是自鸣得意、道貌岸然的废话。

sentences.en: Kathleen got one waffle and Mark got two . They started walking again.
sentences.cn: 凯萨琳吃了一份松饼,马克吃了两份, 吃完两人又继续向前走.

sentences.en: Keeping things short and sweet not only shows people that you are concise and don't waffle, but that you also know what you want.
sentences.cn: 亲切简洁的语言彰显了你简明的个性，不仅不会被误认为是在胡扯，还让对方知道你是一个了解自己想要什么的人。

sentences.en: Nike releases the Waffle Trainer, Sneaker, with Bill Bowerman's famous waffle outsole.
sentences.cn: 耐克发布华夫训练鞋, 有着闻名的比尔鲍尔曼的华夫大底.

sentences.en: That's all I had to say on the subject — we don't want to waffle on about it all day.
sentences.cn: 这个问题我只想说这么多——我们不该一整天都为此废话。

sentences.en: The Japanese towels have a more casual look than the elegant, traditional European waffle weave.
sentences.cn: 比起高雅的传统欧式华夫格织布,日式毛巾的外观看来普通得多.

sentences.en: The report looks impressive but it's really nothing but waffle.
sentences.cn: 这篇报告貌似冠冕堂皇,实际上空洞无物.

sentences.en: This fabulous sorter is made of soft plush velour, waffle - weave, terry and canvas certified organic cotton.
sentences.cn: 这神话般的分拣机是软毛绒天鹅绒制成, 饼,编织, 特里和认证的有机棉帆布.

sentences.en: When you pop a frozen waffle into the toaster, electrical energy turns into heat energy.
sentences.cn: 当你取出一块冷冻饼放进烤面包器时, 电能转化成了热能.

sentences.en: Whenever I open my mouth I don't half waffle on.
sentences.cn: 我无论何时开口，从不夸夸其谈。

sentences.en: Whereas in business , alas, waffle and bullshit have become the gold standard.
sentences.cn: 唉,然而在工作中, 模糊其辞和胡说八道都已成了黄金定律.

words.tran_cn: [食品]华夫饼干；动听而无意义的话；无聊话

phrases.tran_cn: 对开式铁心；烘蛋奶饼的铁模
